name: Bitter Rescue
description:
A game done for the Bitter Jam Hosted by BreMea, RedDashGames
#bitterjam

A simple scrolling space shooter

The objective of the game is to make it to the end of each level.
Collecting the lost Astronauts is an optional challenge.

There are only 3 levels but increasingly difficult.
The main challenge is to keep in time with the grid based scrolling movement so that you don't get hit by the walls.
The enemies also shoot back once shot, so take care to dodge their return fire.

                           Controls

              Left  <--[A]   [D]-->  Right

                       Fire Laser
                       [ Space ]

                         Exit
                        [Esc]

Music used under (CC)
DOS-88 Synthwave Music Library
Crash Landing.mp3
Race to Mars.mp3
DOS-88 - Far away.mp3
